desc: Maple Syrup 100% pure hand-crafted and bottled in Minnesota and available for shipping anywhere. Unique flavor-infused maple syrup which is great for cooking breakfast and dessert. Use this flavored syrup on pancakes, waffles, meats and even in your favorite cocktail. Three Rivers Farm Maple Syrup.

layout.text: ADD THAT EXTRA FLAVOR YOU HAVE ALWAYS BEEN LOOKING FOR WITH THREE RIVERS FARM MAPLE SYRUP PRODUCTS
